title: How do I change the audio language for the movie? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body: Solution home Recommended Topics BookMyShow Stream How do I change the audio language for the movie? Print Modified on: Thu, 4 Feb, 2021 at  7:45 PM You can change the audio language for the movie from within the video player by clicking on the Language button. Did you find it helpful? Yes No Send feedback Sorry we couldn't be helpful. Help us improve this article with your feedback.
